evidence_example.title: Simple OpenZB demo
evidence_example.small_descr: This is a simple OpenZB demo showing the features of the communication library.
evidence_example.long_descr:
This demo is a self running application of IEEE 802.15.4. The cordinator and the end device communicate some useful measurements which are displayed on the LCD : a) number of packets sent; b) number of loss packets; c) number of corrupted packets.
These measurements helps to understand the nature of the environment where the devices are deployed.
WARNING: the application code is the same for coordinator and end-device. To select the device type make the appropriate change in the conf.oil
